modName: Knight Of Thorns Armor And Spear of Thorns
summary: This mod add a new set of High Resolution Heavy Armor(body scalable) and a new Weapon to the game.(for both male and Female )
descriptionHtml:
This mod add a new set of High Resolution Heavy Armor(body scalable) and a new Weapon(Spear Of Thorns) to the game.they are both totally made from scratch..They are both forge-able and upgradable.THE ARMOR IS AVAILABLE FOR BOTH MALE AND FEMALE,thought it was designed with male in mind i thought some people using female characters might try to use it.So NO BOOB PLATE,NOR REVEALING PARTS,NOR CURVACEOUS BODIES.THIS ARMOR IS UNISEX.

(And Yes I'm a Huge darksouls Fan,if you haven't guessed Already with the multiple references)

There is no Armor parts models for the menus yet,they appear as Steel plate armor parts(the Spear has a menu model though).But i will add them later.

*Armor Defense Base Ratings:(The armor ratings will auto adjust themselves depending of your level by adding a multiplier effect on those base ratings below).

-Boots:21
-Cuirass:52
-Gauntlet:21
-Helmet:27

*Spear Damage Base Rating: 28


*Where to find them

-In a Locked Coffin located on "Serpent Stone" isle to the East of the winterhold College(check the Map pic).

-To any forge assuming you have the dragon and advanced armor smithing perk.(The Spear is in the Ebony smithing menu )


*Installation

To install Just extract the contents(including folders) of this rar file into your Skyrim game folder.Comes with an esp file you can check and uncheck in the launch menu


*Term of Use

i don't want any part of this mod being modified and/or used in other mods and games without my consent.
